title: uNDu kuladeiva
sahitya:
uNDu kuladeiva rAman namakkuNDu uyir yAvum purakkum aiyan


anupallavi

  toNDu sheidu rAma rAma venru tudhippOr kudi tAngum karuNai nidhi


caraNam    paNDu poruk-koNAppizhai porutthukkoNDu sharaNamenru kadariya
miNDan kAkAsuranukku aruL kOdaNDapANi enum dInasharaNyan
